Events that occurred on 16 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - Author and librarian William Ready is born.
1935 - Animator Jules Bass is born.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.
1981 â€“ Arthedain, the Norwegian Tolkien Society, is founded in Oslo.
1994 - Oxonmoot 1994 at University College.
1995 - Oxonmoot 1995 at University College.
2005 - Oxonmoot 2005 at St Peter's College.
2006 - Oxonmoot 2006 at Somerville College.
2007 - Oxonmoot 2007 at Lady Margaret Hall.
2022 - The episode The Great Wave of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
